value.title: Get Power BI data in Excel without Pivot Tables | Excel Data Types
value.excerpt: Depending on the Power Bi license and the version of excel you have, you can connect Power BI and Excel using the Get Data - Power BI Datasets, but there is another way that will allow you to grab the data without setting a Pivot Table.   Let me show you how in today's video!  Here you can download all

What are Many to many relationships 2. Why you should avoid them  3. How to avoid them  Questions, comments? Let me know in the comment

value.title: Power BI Shows Incorrect Measure Total? How to fix it?

value.title: Debug DAX using Variables in Power BI
value.excerpt: In this video, Marco Russo, from SQL BI, joins Patrick to look at how you can debug DAX using variables in Power BI. value.title: Deploy Power BI dataset schema changes WITHOUT refreshing!
